typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesCSV
MoviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> simpletransform
simpletransform filter(year == '1950' || year == '1960' || year == '1988') ~> Filter1
